pkgmetadata.longdescription: 3D Radial Visualization // Creating 3D radial visualizations of multivariate data. The package extends traditional radial coordinate visualization (RadViz) techniques to three- dimensional space, enabling enhanced exploration and analysis of high-dimensional datasets through interactive 3D plots. Zhu, Dai Maitra (2022) doi:10.1080/10618600.2021.2020129.
